release.action: Added class ChemblSaxParser, which deprecates EbeyeSaxParser (it was only used for ChEMBL xrefs). This new class processes the ebinocle file chembl-target_component.xml instead of chembl-target.xml, due to changes in the content of it.
Now OMIM cross-references are not (unfairly) discarded because of a low score in the UniMed file.
Updated to latest versions of ep-util, biobabel-core and chembl-adapter.
Added XML declaration at the top of the chebi cross-references file.

Modified EbeyeSaxParser in order to use chembl-adapter to filter ChEMBL compounds by criteria defined in a properties file. This will reduce the huge number of compounds coming from ChEMBL, keeping only those which have special interest and specificity.
Added script to provide a XML for ChEBI to generate their cross-references to the Enzyme Portal. This is a requirement for the compound structure search in EP.
Updated to latest versions of ep-util - with improved parsing of activator and inhibitors from UniProt - and biobabel-core.
web links were added to Compounds and Disease resources to enable quick access to the original compound or disease source.

release.description: Cross-references for small molecules taken from IntEnz and UniProt. Fix for ChEMBL parsing. UNIPROT2COMPOUND table. Compounds retrieved with roles.
release.action: Added application to retrieve cross-references from IntEnzXML: EC-reactions, EC-substrates/products, EC-cofactors, Rhea-reactants/products. This replaces the import from ChEBI (cofactors and catalytic activity) which was a bit fuzzy due to text mining.
Added concrete relationships "is_substrate_of" and "is_product_of" for ChEBI-EC cross-references.
Added UniProt-DrugBank cross-references to the mega-map.
Added UniProt-ChEBI cross-references for activators and inhibitors to the mega-map.
Added table uniprot2compound to be used for quick lookups.
Added method to MegaMapper to get compounds related to UniProt IDs as Compound objects (now with a role).
Fixed import of ChEMBL cross references. There were some extra - and wrong - due to a bug in EbeyeSaxParser.
Updated to latest version of ep-util - which provides extraction of inhibitors and activators from UniProt - and ep-domain - which provides roles for compounds.
ChEMBL compounds with names were added to the Mega Mapper
Fixed query in MegaJdbcMapper.getCompounds and MegaJdbcMapper.getDisease so that underscores are taken as part of the UniProt ID prefix and not as oracle wildcards.
PDBe entries with no names (obsolete or redirected) are not added to the mega-map any longer.
Added implementation to parse tab file from UniMed, which will replace the original HTML.
Fixed JDBC query so that underscores in UniProt prefixes are not taken as wildcards by oracle.
Fixed scope of oracle dependency.
Last compounds retrieved from ChEBI are not left out of the mega-map (CompoundsDAOImpl).
Updated to latest version of parent pom file (move to GitHub), biobabel-core and junit.
Organism common name is reset after every UniProt entry (it wasn't, which resulted in many species having 'Human' as common name).
Added method to retrieve cross-references based on fuzzy entry ID, database and relationship.
Modified scripts for releases: removed unnecesary build and added svn command to copy generated statistics to the trunk..

release.description: PDB structure names in the mega-map; xref retrieval by relationship.
release.action: Added PDBe structure names to the mega-map.
Added method to retrieve xrefs by relationship.
Updated to latest versions of ep-domain and junit.
Added dependency on ebeye-client to retrieve PDB structure names (not present in UniProt XML file).
Removed strange unused dependencies.
Prepared statements were not closed, which resulted in lots of 'too many open cursors' exceptions in the webapp log.
Updated to latest versions of biobabel-db and log4j.
